language.hint_01_level_1: The Assault Rifle is the default weapon and has infinite ammo.
language.hint_02_level_1: Staying behind cover helps you regenerate health.
language.hint_01_level_2: The Telekinesis power helps you grab all the power-ups that have fallen from enemies.
language.hint_02_level_2: The Invulnerability power-up renders you invulnerable for a short time.
language.hint_01_level_3: The Flamethrower is a very effective weapon at short distances.
language.hint_01_level_4: Telekinesis can also help you throw enemy grenades back at them.
language.hint_01_level_5: The Rapid Fire power-up makes the Assault Rifle fire faster.
language.hint_01_level_6: The Sniper Rifle is an effective weapon at long distances, allowing for easier headshots.
language.hint_01_level_7: Slow-Time slows down enemies, giving you more time to target them.
language.hint_01_level_8: The Sentinel fires plasma projectiles that inflict damage even while you are behind cover.
language.hint_01_level_9: Heavy Plasma is a slow but powerful weapon that inflicts damage to a wide area.
language.hint_01_level_10: The Gunship is a powerful boss that fires both light and heavy projectiles.

language.hint_01_level_1: Súng trường tấn công là vũ khí mặc định và có đạn vô hạn.
language.hint_02_level_1: Nấp chắn giúp bạn phục hồi sinh lực.
language.hint_01_title_level_2: ĐIỀU KHIỂN VẬT THỂ TỪ XA
language.hint_01_level_2: Siêu năng lực Điều khiển vật thể từ xa giúp bạn thu tất cả các đồ tăng lực rớt ra từ địch.
language.hint_02_level_2: Đồ tăng lực Bất tử giúp bạn không bị thương trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn.
language.hint_01_level_3: Súng phun lửa là vũ khí rất hiệu quả khi ở cự li gần.
language.hint_01_level_4: Siêu năng lực Điều khiển vật thể từ xa còn có thể giúp bạn quăng ngược lựu đạn của địch về phía chúng.
language.hint_01_level_5: Đồ tăng lực Bắn nhanh giúp Súng trường tấn công nã đạn nhanh hơn.
language.hint_01_level_6: Súng bắn tỉa là vũ khí rất hiệu quả cho bắn tầm xa, cho phép bắn vào đầu dễ hơn.
language.hint_01_level_7: Sức mạnh này sẽ làm địch chậm lại, cho bạn thêm thời gian để ngắm bắn.
language.hint_01_level_8: Lính canh bắn đạn plasma gây sát thương ngay cả khi bạn đang nấp chắn.
language.hint_01_level_9: Plasma Hạng nặng là một vũ khí tuy chậm nhưng cực mạnh, gây sát thương diện rộng.
language.hint_01_level_10: Chiến cơ là một trùm cực mạnh, bắn đạn cả hạng nhẹ lẫn hạng nặng.
language.next_text_01: ĐIỀU KHIỂN VẬT THỂ TỪ XA / ĐỒ TĂNG LỰC BẤT TỬ

language.hint_01_level_1: Le fusil d'assaut est l'arme par défaut et possède des munitions infinies.
language.hint_02_level_1: Rester à couvert permet de régénérer votre santé.
language.hint_01_level_2: Le pouvoir de télékinésie permet de récupérer les power-ups que les ennemis laissent tomber.
language.hint_02_level_2: Le power-up d'invulnérabilité vous rend invulnérable pendant un court moment.
language.hint_01_level_3: Le lance-flammes est une arme très efficace à courte portée.
language.hint_01_level_4: La télékinésie permet aussi de renvoyer les grenades à l'ennemi.
language.hint_01_level_5: Le power-up Tir rapide accélère la cadence de tir du fusil d'assaut.
language.hint_01_level_6: Le fusil de sniper est une arme efficace à longue distance, facilitant les tirs en pleine tête.
language.hint_01_level_7: Le ralenti ralentit les ennemis, vous donnant plus de temps pour les viser.
language.hint_01_level_8: La sentinelle tire des projectiles de plasma qui infligent des dégâts, même en étant à couvert.
language.hint_01_level_9: Le plasma lourd est une arme lente, mais puissante, qui inflige des dégâts sur une large zone.
language.hint_01_level_10: L'hélicoptère de combat est un puissant boss qui tire à la fois des projectiles légers et lourds.

language.hint_01_level_1: Das Sturmgewehr ist die Standardwaffe und hat unbegrenzte Munition.
language.hint_02_level_1: Dich in Deckung zu verschanzen, hilft dir, deine Gesundheit zu erneuern.
language.hint_01_level_2: Mit Telekinese kannst du alle Extras, die Feinde verloren haben, aufsammeln.
language.hint_02_level_2: Das Unverletzbarkeits-Extra macht dich für kurze Zeit unverletzbar.
language.hint_01_level_3: Der Flammenwerfer ist eine sehr wirkungsvolle Waffe auf kurze Distanz.
language.hint_01_level_4: Mit Telekinese kannst du auch feindliche Granaten zurückwerfen.
language.hint_01_level_5: Das Schnellfeuer-Extra bewirkt, dass das Sturmgewehr schneller feuert.
language.hint_01_level_6: Das Sniper-Gewehr ist eine wirkungsvolle Waffe für Langstrecken, mit der du Kopfschüsse einfacher erzielen kannst.
language.hint_01_level_7: Verlangsamung lässt Feinde langsamer bewegen, sodass du mehr Zeit hast, sie anzuvisieren.
language.hint_01_level_8: Der Sentinel feuert Plasmageschosse ab, die Schaden zufügen, selbst wenn das Ziel sich in Deckung befindet.
language.hint_01_level_9: Das schwere Plasmagewehr ist eine langsame, aber schlagkräftige Waffe, die großflächigen Schaden zufügen kann.
language.hint_01_level_10: Der Kampfhelikopter ist ein schlagkräftiger Boss, der sowohl leichte als auch schwere Geschosse abfeuern kann.

language.hint_01_level_1: El rifle de asalto es el arma predeterminada y tiene munición infinita.
language.hint_02_level_1: Permanecer a cubierto te ayudará a regenerar tu salud.
language.hint_01_level_2: Los poderes de telequinesia te ayudarán a recoger todos los potenciadores que dejen caer los enemigos.
language.hint_02_level_2: El potenciador de invulnerabilidad te vuelve invencible durante un breve periodo de tiempo.
language.hint_01_level_3: El lanzallamas es un arma muy efectiva a corta distancia.
language.hint_01_level_4: La telequinesia te ayudará a devolver las granadas a los enemigos.
language.hint_01_level_5: El potenciador de fuego rápido permitirá que el rifle de asalto dispare más rápido.
language.hint_01_level_6: El fusil de francotirador es un arma efectiva a larga distancia, lo que permite disparar a la cabeza con más facilidad.
language.hint_01_level_7: El ralentizado hace que los enemigos se muevan más lentamente, lo que facilita apuntar con precisión.
language.hint_01_level_8: El centinela dispara proyectiles de plasma que infligen daño hasta cuando estás a cubierto.
language.hint_01_level_9: El plasma pesado es un arma lenta pero muy potente que inflige daño en un área amplia.
language.hint_01_level_10: La aeronave de combate es una potente unidad jefe que dispara proyectiles tanto ligeros como pesados.
language.next_text_01: PODER DE TELEQUINESIA / POTENCIADOR DE INVULNERABILIDAD

language.hint_01_level_1: Il fucile d'assalto è l'arma predefinita e ha munizioni infinite.
language.hint_02_level_1: I ripari ti aiutano a rigenerare la salute.
language.hint_01_level_2: Il potere Telecinesi permette di prendere tutti i potenziamenti lasciati dai nemici.
language.hint_02_level_2: Il potenziamento Invulnerabilità ti rende invulnerabile per un breve periodo di tempo.
language.hint_01_level_3: Il lanciafiamme è un'arma molto efficace a brevi distanze.
language.hint_01_level_4: Telecinesi ti può anche aiutare a rilanciare le granate contro il nemico.
language.hint_01_level_5: Il potenziamento Fuoco rapido rende più veloci i colpi del fucile d'assalto.
language.hint_01_level_6: Il fucile da cecchino è un'arma efficace a lunghe distanze e permette di mettere a segno più facilmente i colpi alla testa.
language.hint_01_level_7: Rallentamento rallenta i nemici, offrendoti più tempo per prenderli di mira.
language.hint_01_level_8: La sentinella spara proiettili al plasma che infliggono danni anche quando sei al riparo.
language.hint_01_level_9: Il fucile al plasma pesante è un'arma lenta ma potente che infligge danni ad ampie aree.
language.hint_01_level_10: Il velivolo d'assalto è un potente mezzo che spara proiettili leggeri e pesanti.

language.hint_01_level_1: É uma arma padrão e tem munição infinita.
language.hint_02_level_1: Fique atrás de uma cobertura para recuperar a saúde.
language.hint_01_level_2: O poder de Telekinesis ajuda a pegar todos os acessórios deixados pelos inimigos.
language.hint_02_level_2: Você fica invencível por um curto período com esse acessório.
language.hint_01_level_3: O Lança-chamas é uma arma muito útil a curta distância.
language.hint_01_level_4: Telekinesis também pode ajudar a lançar granadas dos inimigos de volta para eles.
language.hint_01_level_5: O acessório de Rajada torna o Fuzil de Assalto ainda mais rápido.
language.hint_01_level_6: É uma arma útil a longa distância, perfeita para certar tiros na cabeça.
language.hint_01_level_7: Reduz a velocidade dos inimigos e te dá mais tempo para mirar.
language.hint_01_level_8: Dispara projéteis de plasma que causam dano mesmo quando você está atrás da cobertura.
language.hint_01_level_9: É uma arma lenta, mas poderosa. Causa dano em uma grande área.
language.hint_01_level_10: É um chefe poderoso que dispara rajadas de luz e projéteis.

language.hint_01_level_1: Saldırı silahı temel silahtır ve cephanesi sınırsızdır.
language.hint_01_level_2: Telekinesisin gücüyle düşmanlardan düşen tüm güçlendirmeleri toplayabilirsin.
language.hint_02_level_2: Dokunulmazlık güçlendirmesiyle kısa bir süre için dokunulmaz olursun.
language.hint_01_level_3: Lav atıcı kısa menzilde çok etkili bir silahtır.
language.hint_01_level_4: Telekinesisle, düşman el bombalarını onlara geri de fırlatabilirsin.
language.hint_01_level_5: Hızlı ateş güçlendirmesiyle saldırı silahı daha hızlı ateşlenir.
language.hint_01_level_6: Dürbünlü tüfek, uzun menzilde etkili ve kafadan vuruşları kolaylaştıran bir silahtır.
language.hint_01_level_7: Zaman yavaşlatma, düşmanları yavaşlatarak onlara hedef alman için daha fazla zaman verir.
language.hint_01_level_8: Gözcü, siper arkasındayken bile hasar veren plazma mermileri ateşler.
language.hint_01_level_9: Ağır plazma, yavaş ama geniş bir alana etki eden güçlü bir silahtır.
language.hint_01_level_10: Silahgemisi, ışık ve ağır mermiler atan güçlü bir patrondur.

language.hint_01_level_1: Штурмовая винтовка - оружие с неограниченным количеством патронов, которое вы получаете по умолчанию.
language.hint_02_level_1: Помогает восстанавливать здоровье, пока вы находитесь в укрытии.
language.hint_01_level_2: Телекинез поможет вам собрать все усиления, которые упустили враги.
language.hint_02_level_2: Это усиление делает вас неуязвимым на короткое время.
language.hint_01_level_3: Огнемет - крайне эффективное оружие ближнего боя.
language.hint_01_level_4: С помощью телекинеза вы сможете отбрасывать на врагов гранаты, которые они в вас бросили.
language.hint_01_level_5: Благодаря данному усилению ваша штурмовая винтовка будет стрелять быстрее.
language.hint_01_level_6: Снайперская винтовка - эффективное оружие дальнего боя. С ее помощью вы сможете легко попасть в голову врага.
language.hint_01_level_7: Замедляет движения врагов, позволяя вам лучше прицелиться.
language.hint_01_level_8: Страж стреляет плазмой, нанося урон, даже если вы находитесь в укрытии.
language.hint_01_level_9: Плазмомет - медленное, но мощное оружие с большой зоной поражения.
language.hint_01_level_10: Штурмовик - мощный босс, стреляет мелкими и крупными снарядами.

language.hint_01_level_1: Senapan Serbu adalah senjata awal dan memiliki amunisi tak terbatas.
language.hint_02_level_1: Bersembunyi di balik perlindungan membantumu meregenerasi nyawa.
language.hint_01_level_2: Kekuatan Telekinesis membantumu memperoleh semua power up yang jatuh dari musuh.
language.hint_02_level_2: Power up Kekebalan memberimu ketahanan untuk waktu yang singkat.
language.hint_01_level_3: Pelontar Api adalah senjata yang sangat efektif untuk jarak dekat.
language.hint_01_level_4: Telekinesis juga bisa membantumu melemparkan granat musuh kembali pada mereka.
language.hint_01_level_5: Power up TEMBAKAN CEPAT membuat Senapan Serbu menembak lebih cepat.
language.hint_01_level_6: SENAPAN RUNDUK adalah senjata yang efektif untuk jarak jauh, menembak di kepala jadi lebih mudah.
language.hint_01_level_7: Waktu Lambat memperlambat musuh, memberimu lebih banyak waktu untuk membidik mereka.
language.hint_01_level_8: Penjaga menembakkan proyektil plasma yang menimbulkan kerusakan bahkan saat kamu berlindung.
language.hint_01_level_9: Plasma Berat adalah senjata lamban tapi kuat yang menimbulkan kerusakan di area yang luas.
language.hint_01_level_10: Gunship adalah bos kuat yang menembakkan proyektil ringan dan berat.

language.touch_continue: แตะเพื่อไปต่อ
language.hint_01_title_level_1: ไรเฟิลจู่โจม
language.hint_01_level_1: ปืนไรเฟิลจู่โจมเป็นอาวุธตั้งต้นที่มีกระสุนไม่จำกัด
language.hint_02_title_level_1: การฟื้นฟูพลังชีวิต
language.hint_02_level_1: การหลบอยู่หลังที่กำบังจะช่วยให้คุณฟื้นฟูพลังชีวิต
language.hint_01_level_2: พลังโทรจิตจะช่วยให้คุณเก็บตัวเสริมพลังที่ตกจากศัตรูได้
language.hint_02_title_level_2: ตัวเสริมพลังอมตะ
language.hint_02_level_2: ตัวเสริมพลังอมตะจะทำให้คุณยิงไม่เข้าในช่วงระยะเวลาสั้น ๆ
language.hint_01_level_3: ปืนพ่นไฟเป็นอาวุธที่มีประสิทธิภาพมากในระยะใกล้
language.hint_01_title_level_4: ระเบิดของศัตรู
language.hint_01_level_4: พลังโทรจิตยังช่วยให้คุณปาระเบิดของศัตรูกลับไปหาเจ้าของได้
language.hint_01_level_5: ตัวเสริมพลังยิงรัวจะทำให้ปืนไรเฟิลจู่โจมยิงได้เร็วขึ้น
language.hint_01_title_level_6: ไรเฟิลซุ่มยิง
language.hint_01_level_6: ปืนไรเฟิลซุ่มยิงเป็นอาวุธที่มีประสิทธิภาพในระยะไกล ทำให้ยิงหัวได้ง่ายดายยิ่งขึ้น
language.hint_01_level_7: ชะลอเวลาจะทำให้ศัตรูเคลื่อนที่ช้าลง ทำให้คุณมีเวลาเล็งพวกมันนานขึ้น
language.hint_01_level_8: เซนทิเนลจะยิงกระสุนพลาสม่าที่สร้างความเสียหายให้กับคุณ แม้ในยามที่คุณหลบอยู่หลังที่กำบัง
language.hint_01_title_level_9: เฮฟวี่พลาสม่า
language.hint_01_level_9: ปืนเฮฟวี่พลาสม่าเป็นอาวุธทรงพลังที่จะสร้างความเสียหายแบบกินวงกว้าง
language.hint_01_level_10: ยานพิฆาตเป็นบอสทรงพลังที่จะระดมยิงทั้งกระสุนเบาและกระสุนหนักใส่คุณ
language.next_text_01: พลังโทรจิต / ตัวเสริมพลังอมตะ
language.next_text_03: ระเบิดของศัตรู
language.next_text_04: ตัวเสริมพลังยิงรัว
language.next_text_05: ไรเฟิลซุ่มยิง
language.next_text_06: พลังชะลอเวลา
language.next_text_07: เซนทิเนลศัตรู
language.next_text_08: เฮฟวี่พลาสม่า
language.next_text_09: ยานพิฆาตของศัตรู
language.next_text_11: เลเวลยากมาก!
language.next_text_12: เลเวลยากที่สุด!
language.destroy_title: จำนวนศัตรูที่กำจัด:

language.hint_01_level_1: 突擊步槍是必備武器，有無止盡的彈藥。
language.hint_02_level_1: 躲在牆後掩護可以讓你恢復生命力
language.hint_01_level_2: 隔空取物的能力，可以讓你拾起敵人掉下來的道具。
language.hint_02_level_2: 萬夫莫敵道具可讓你在短暫時間內擁有無敵的能力。
language.hint_01_level_3: 噴火器是非常強大的武器，尤其是在近距離時。
language.hint_01_level_4: 隔空取物也可以讓你把敵人的手榴彈反拋回去。
language.hint_01_level_5: 火速發射這個道具，可以讓突擊步槍更快速發射子彈。
language.hint_01_level_6: 狙擊步槍是非常強大的武器，尤其是在遠距離時，讓爆頭更加容易。
language.hint_01_level_7: 放慢速度會讓敵人變成慢動作，給你更多時間瞄準他們。
language.hint_01_level_8: 鬼影哨兵會發射電漿炮，就算在牆後掩護也無法避免受到傷害。
language.hint_01_level_9: 重型電漿炮的射速雖緩慢但卻很強大，傷害的影響範圍會擴大。
language.hint_01_level_10: 空中戰機是強大的敵軍，輕型及重型的砲彈都是它的武器。
language.next_text_01: 隔空取物能力/萬夫莫敵道具

language.hint_01_level_1: 突击步枪为默认武器，拥有无限弹药。
language.hint_02_level_1: 待在掩体后可助你回复生命值。
language.hint_01_level_2: 心灵遥感的念力能帮助你拾取敌人掉落的所有道具。
language.hint_02_level_2: 无敌道具能使你短时间内无敌。
language.hint_01_level_3: 火焰喷射器是极为有效的近程武器。
language.hint_01_level_4: 心灵遥感还能帮助你将敌人扔出的手雷反扔向他们自己。
language.hint_01_level_5: 急速射击道具使突击步枪的射速提高。
language.hint_01_level_6: 狙击枪是有效的远距离武器，用它能轻松完成爆头。
language.hint_01_level_7: 时间缓速能使敌人动作减慢，给你更多时间瞄准。
language.hint_01_level_8: 哨兵发射等离子弹，即使你躲在掩体后时也能造成伤害。
language.hint_01_level_9: 等离子重炮是一件速度缓慢但威力巨大的武器，能造成大面积伤害。
language.hint_01_level_10: 武装直升机是强大的首领级敌人，同时拥有轻型和重型火力。
language.next_text_01: 心灵遥感 / 无敌道具
